content: Tom was undoubtedly the most intelligent student in the entire school, but whenever the teacher asked him a question for which he was not prepared, he was filled with such nervousness that he would become confused, and something utterly incomprehensible would issue from his mouth as soon as he opened it.
translations: ita:Tom era indubbiamente l'allievo pi√π intelligente di tutta la scuola, ma ogni volta che l'insegnante gli faceva una doman
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by AlanF_US (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
